item.title: nix-direnv
item.description: Table of Contents direnv nix-direnv Nix Shell Rust development environment Go development environment Nix Shell and Flakes Audio / Video Transcoding tools Photos and Videos Static Website nix-shell and shabang Emacs References direnv The power of nix with direnv is easy to understate.
